title: Papaya and avocado salad
ingredients: ['1 romaine or cos lettuce heart, about 170 g (6 oz)', '2 spring onions, thinly sliced', '1 large orange or yellow pepper, quartered and seeded', '1 large avocado, about 200 g (7 oz)', '1 large papaya, about 500 g (1 lb 2 oz)', '6 tbsp pumpkin seeds', 'Spicy dressing', 'juice of ½ lime', '1½ tbsp extra virgin olive oil', 'pinch of paprika', 'pinch of ground cumin', '½ tsp light soft brown sugar']
